url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Monsters/New Familiars/Small and Vermin Familiars/Familiar/Centipede/House
environment: temperate or warm forest or underground

sections.name: Special Abilities
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Monsters/New Familiars/Small and Vermin Familiars/Familiar/Centipede/House/Special Abilities

sections.body: Bite—injury; save Fort DC 10; frequency 1/round for 2 rounds; effect daze 1 round; cure 1 save.
sections.name: Poison
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Monsters/New Familiars/Small and Vermin Familiars/Familiar/Centipede/House/Special Abilities/Poison

sections.body: Multi-legged house centipedes can be found almost anywhere, and can have from 20 to more than 300 legs. Their bites are poisonous, and can daze the unwary.

name: Familiar, Centipede, House
